title: Journal Reference
description: This represents the list of journal articles cited.

book-authors.title: book-authors
book-authors.description: Authors of the book, in order of appearance, written as <first name><space><middle name(s)><space><last name><comma>
examples: Charles Darwin, J. F. Duthie, William Hopkins

book-title.title: book-title
examples: On the origin of species by means of natural selection : or, The preservation of favoured races in the struggle for life

citation-pages.title: citation-pages
citation-pages.description: First page and last page, separated by a comma; for single page citations, a single value may be used

city.title: city
city.description: City that the book was published in
